info.name: Notify-Service Tests
info.description:
### Notify-Service Tests

Authored:** [Ayooluwa Paul Obembe](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ayooluwa-obembe-898a782b0/)

**Base URL:** `https://webhook.site`  
**Purpose:**

Acts as the final integration check in the service chain. It validates whether user and order data successfully trigger notifications or alerts, mimicking downstream message or webhook systems.

**Endpoints Covered:**

| Method | Endpoint | Purpose |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `GET` | `/ping` | Verifies connectivity and system responsiveness. |
| `GET` | `/verify-order` | Simulates notification delivery or webhook trigger for order confirmation. |

**Key Tests:**

- Mock notifications for mismatched `user_id` or failed order creation.
    
- Error simulation using HTTP status codes (`https://dummyjson.com/400/...`).
    
- Logs detailed alerts on integration failures using `pm.sendRequest()`.
    
- Ensures graceful handling of service downtime or bad responses.
    

**Data Flow:**

‚Üí Consumes `orderId`, `userId`, `token` from previous suites.

‚Üí Triggers mock HTTP notification or alert if inconsistency detected.
